Stingtra: Well, your safe now so don't worry. Just try to think of the good=
 times and not the bad times. I know that sounds hard because there have be=
en so many bad times but just try...Relax think of the good times.....

*St=
ingtra softly says to Quickstrike*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: =
Talon Harvilicz 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, July 31, 2000 12=
:39 PM
  Subject: Neo Beast Wars


  Quickstrike/Wildfire: 





  Quickstr=
ike panted lighten then quickly calmed down, seeing that he was safe, and S=
tingtra was near-by. He pulled his head back and sighed. He laid back and l=
ooked up at her. 

  "Yeah, ah did." he said and rubbed his head. "I saw uh=
 big wolf. Ah was in th' old base an' it attacked me." He slowly blinked. "=
Ah think ah saw it b'fore." 



  Wildfire: 


  Wildfire walked to Dark Mo=
use by the console. She said: You must be on your guard. She had her ears p=
inned back. Do you understand what happened to your snake-bot?

  The sky o=
utside the cave was growing a heavy night. The stars were just begining to =
take over the deepening atmosphere.
